NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
COLEUS: The shuttle has landed safely. Friends, I am happy to announce the first survey expedition after the reunion is officially underway!
2
1
THATCH: I never imagined after the crash we would one day explore a new planet together again, my friends. I feel overcome by gratitude.. and excitement!
3
2
MELORAE: Come now, Thatch.. We have wept enough during our reunion, and every day since! Now is the time to bask in the joy of exploration!
4 3
PLUME: I only wish Keek could be here too..
5
4
PLUME: Come, my friends. We should explore this island for shelter from the endless rain, before those cyclones head our way.
6
5
THATCH: An update: friends, this island appears to have a wonderful, cavernous interior!
7
6
THATCH: Until we can find more ideal shelter, I believe we should move our supplies from this camp into there!
Pioneer EX1 1
Pioneer EX2 7
